successes.title: Impossible Instant Lab: Turn iPhone Images into Real Photos
successes.description: Transform your digital iPhone images into real instant photographs that you can touch, caress and share with friends.

Pledges.description: Get the Ball Rolling! The first 222 backers get one Instant Lab for HALF of the $299 retail price. Includes 1 Impossible film voucher. Shipping US: Free / Shipping Europe: Add $35 (incl VAT) / Shipping Rest of World: Add $20 (no tax or import duties incl)

Early Birds! We can offer a limited number of 1,111 units at this price. Includes 1 Impossible film voucher. Shipping US: Free / Shipping Europe: Add $35 (incl VAT) / Shipping Rest of World: Add $20 (no tax or import duties incl)

Get your INSTANT LAB at a great price before it hits stores. Your pledges will decide how many we make. Includes 1 Impossible film voucher. Shipping US: Free / Shipping Europe: Add $35 (for VAT and shipping) / Shipping Rest of World: Add $20 (no tax or import duties incl)

Special ALL BLACK Kickstarter Exclusive Edition! 1000 numbered units, engraved with your Kickstarter username. Includes 2 Impossible film vouchers. Shipping US: Free / Shipping Europe: Add $35 (incl VAT) / Shipping Rest of World: Add $20 (no tax or import duties incl)

Due to popular request - The DOUBLE-UP PACK!  Select this level to receive 2 original Instant Labs and 2 film vouchers for a great price. Make sure to read Update #2 to see how to get twice the film... Shipping US: Free / Shipping Europe: Add $45 (for VAT and shipping) / Shipping Rest of World: Add $30 (no tax or import duties incl)

STORE KIT.  Be among the first stores to carry Instant Labs - or just pick up 5 at a great price to share with friends! At this level, you'll get 5 Instant Labs, plus 10 Impossible film vouchers and printed POS materials. U.S. individuals or organizations in MA or NY must add local sales tax to their pledge. Resellers must supply valid credentials. Shipping Rest of World: Add $50. Price is net. Invoices issued in NY for USA/NAFTA, in Austria for EU/EMEA (with UID.Nr.), in Japan for Asia/APAC.

The Ultimate Instant Lab GOLD Edition. Receive one of only 10 numbered GOLD-plated Instant Labs, personalized with your name engraved onto the device. Enjoy: brunch at the famous Hotel Americain in Amsterdam, Holland. A luxury coach round-trip to Enschede. A founders tour of the Impossible (former Polaroid) factory and a fantastic dinner cooked & served by founders Doc, Christian and Andr√© in the factory canteen. Includes 10 film packs of your choice. You will receive the FIRST completed devices and films during the factory dinner. Schedule to be arranged in 2nd half of February 2013.

DISTRIBUTOR KIT.  Get into the real photo business with 10 Instant Labs, plus 60 packs of Impossible film and printed POS material. U.S. individuals or organizations in MA or NY must pay sales tax. Resellers must supply valid credentials. Shipping Rest of World: Add $50. Price is net. Invoices issued in NY for USA/NAFTA, in Austria for EU/EMEA (with UID.Nr.), in Japan for Asia/APAC.
